ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(ISCHANGED(Status__c), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Send Small Fleet Link'), Number_of_Vehicles_from_Account__c >=11)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Only small fleet accounts are eligible to be sent to the Small Fleets Store (1-11veh). The vehicle count on this account indicates it should be handled by an AE. If this contact is incorrectly associated with this account, please submit a SalesOps ticket.
